resources.string: TCP Testsuite performs in-depth analysis of your path of connectivity to the Internet, focusing on the interference of middleboxes (NATs, proxies, firewalls) with TCP traffic. \n It forms part of a survey of the state of the widely used networks to inform further development of the TCP protocol and extensions.
Developed at the University of Cambridge
